TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit _RemotableHandle extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) accessibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about <xref:Accessibility._RemotableHandle>, see the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
